attributes.action: Consider a Helicopter-Drop of RBS Shares to the British Public
attributes.background:
This Government could distribute the hard-to-shift stakes to the British Public. This would depoliticise RBS and remove a stock overhang and push the bank to a more public forum.
The Bank has more chance of recovering, removed from the government through public share distribution
#IWantMyBankBack

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition setting out exactly how you would like the Government to redistribute RBS shares to the general public.
